Name: TestCardOne
Description: Deal damage to one enemy with base power ${TotalPower}.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: TestCardTwo
Description: Deal damage to all enemies with base power ${TotalPower}.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: TestCardThree
Description: Draw 1 card.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: TestCardFour
Description: Heal one target with base power ${TotalHealing}.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: PoisonDart
Description: Deal light damage and poison a target.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: ArmourBreaker
Description: Deals moderate damage. Damage is doubled against barriers.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: HyperBeam
Description: Costs all of your mana. Base damage is equal to double the mana spent to cast this spell.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: TestCardFive
Description: Draw cards until your deck is empty, then draw one more.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: Trick
Description: Swap your hand and deck.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: TestCardSix
Description: Summon a TestSummon.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: HowlOfCommand
Description: Force all Wolf Pack allies to attack the chosen target. Attacks made against the target have increased base power.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: EnergyInTheAir
Description: Deal damage to any one target. Base power is equal to the number of spells cast this turn.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: HammerBlow
Description: Deals damage to one target. Deals 1.2x damage to stunned targets. Stuns targets that aren't stunned.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: Shurikenjutsu
Description: Deal damage to any one target. Damage is calculated using your Agility.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: MasterOfReality
Description: Instead of drawing a card, you may Create a card instead. Cards created this way are Temporary.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: ApocalypseChanneler
Description: You may permanently Destroy any number of cards in your Collection. Attack a random enemy X times with base power X, where X is quadruple the number of cards destroyed this way.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: GoreRush
Description: Deal damage to one target. Base damage is increased by 1.5x if the target is bleeding.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: CallForFriends
Description: Summon an entity of the same type as this one. Has a 50% chance to fail.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: PinpointThrust
Description: Deals damage to one target. Has a 1/5 chance to be a Critical Hit. Critical Hits ignore defences and deal 1.5x damage.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: Inflame
Description: Inflict Burn on the target and give it 2 stacks of Muscle Surge
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: InfectedBite
Description: Deals damage to one target and always inflicts either Poison or Bleeding.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: Screech
Description: Inflict ToughnessDown on all enemies.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: Vomit
Description: Inflicts 3 stacks of poison on to the target.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: Demi
Description: Attempt to cut a random enemies' HP in half X times. Each attempt has a 2/5 success chance.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: SwarmAttack
Description: Each entity of the same type as this one attacks the target.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: ThisIsATest
Description: This is a default description.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: TrainOfThought
Description: Draw a card, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your draw pile. Create an Ephemeral Train Of Thought and add it to your hand.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: QuickJab
Description: Deals small damage to one target. This card has a high Action Speed.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: FleetFootwork
Description: Until the end of this turn, whenever you play a card, increase its Action Speed by 1.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: StaunchDefence
Description: Until your next turn, you intercept all single target enemy cards that would target allies. You take 1/2 damage from all attacks, but cannot evade attacks.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: KillRush
Description: Deals high damage to one target. If a character is defeated with this card, Create a copy of this card and play it for free.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.

Name: CutTheDecks
Description: Each character shuffles their Hand, Discard and Draw Piles together, then exiles the top half of the Draw Pile (rounded up), then draws 5 cards.
FlavourText: This is a default flavour text.
